title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Parsippany, NJ, USA
description:
Please join us for an exciting Coderetreat in Northern New Jersey. We'll bring the food and wifi, you bring your laptop and desire to practice coding!  
This is our second time hosting the Global Day of Codretreat, this time it will be in our swanky new office! 
For information on why you should attend, I wrote this blog after hosting last year's coderetreat: Five Reasons to Attend a Coderetreat (http://jasonjolley.com/5-reasons-to-attend-a-coderetreat/) 
Please click here to register: http://www.microstrat.com/content/global-day-coderetreat-2015
